languages.text: "Я — часть Дома Орселлио, древней династии {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Испокон веков наш род служил во благо познания, раздвигая пределы безвестной мглы. В Атласе Звездных Путей хранятся две тысячи восемьсот сорок три маршрута, охватывающих сектора Сегментум Обскурус и простирающихся от {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} до {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: "Я — часть Дома Орселлио, древней династии {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Испокон веков наш род служил во благо познания, раздвигая пределы безвестной мглы. В Атласе Звездных Путей хранятся две тысяча восемьсот сорок три маршрута, охватывающих сектора Сегментум Обскурус и простирающиеся от {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} до {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."
languages.original_text: "Я — часть Дома Орселлио, древней династии {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Испокон веков наш род служил во благо познания, раздвигая пределы безвестной мглы. В Атласе Звездных Путей хранятся две тысячи восемьсот сорок три маршрута, охватывающих сектора Сегментум Обскурус и простирающихся от {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} до {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}..."

The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred forty three routes that chart the sectors of Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the Koronus Expanse to the Holy Terra..."

The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我是奥赛罗家族的一员，我的家族是{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的古老家族。自古以来，我的家族一直致力于推动知识的发展，在黑暗的未知领域中不断开辟道路。我的群星圣仪包含了两千八百四十三条航线，描绘了朦胧星域的各个区域，从{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}开始，一直到{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}……”
languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: “我是奥塞罗家族的一员，我的家族是{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的古老家族。自古以来，我的家族一直致力于推动知识的发展，在黑暗的未知领域中不断开辟道路。我的群星圣仪包含了两千八百四十三条航线，描绘了朦胧星域的各个区域，从{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}开始，一直到{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the Navis Nobilite. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the Koronus Expanse to Holy Terra..."

languages.text: «Soy parte de la casa Orsellio, una antigua dinastía de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Desde tiempos inmemoriales, nuestra familia ha hecho avanzar el conocimiento, trabajando en los límites de la oscuridad más incógnita. El Atlas de Vías Estelares contiene dos mil ochocientas cuarenta y tres rutas que recorren el Segmentum Obscurus y van desde la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} hasta la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}...».
languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: «Soy parte de la casa Orsellio, una antigua dinastía de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Desde tiempos inmemoriales, nuestra familia ha hecho avanzar el conocimiento, trabajando en los límites de la oscuridad más incógnita. El Atlas de Vías Estelares contiene dos mil ochocientas cuarenta y tres rutas que recorren el Segmentum Obscurus y van desde la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} hasta la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の古代王朝、オーセリオ家の一員です。太古の昔から、私たちの一族は知識を発展させ、暗い未知の世界の境界を押し広げるために尽くしてきました。スターウェイ・アトラスには2,843の航路があり、〈薄明の宙域〉の宙域を網羅し、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}から{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}まで繋がっています…」
languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の古代王朝、オーセリオ家の一員です。太古の昔から、私たちの一族は知識を発展させ、暗い未知の世界の境界を押し広げるために尽くしてきました。スターウェイ・アトラスには2,843の航路があり、〈薄明の宙域〉の宙域を網羅し、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}から{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}まで繋がっています…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich gehöre Haus Orsellio an, einer uralten Dynastie der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Unsere Familie dient seit Urzeiten der Mehrung des Wissens und der Erkundung des dunklen Unbekannten. Der Atlas der Sternenwege enthält 2843 Routen durch die Sektoren des Segmentum Obscurus, die von der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} bis zur {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} reichen ..."
languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gehöre Haus Orsellio an, einer uralten Dynastie der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Unsere Familie dient seit Urzeiten der Mehrung des Wissens und der Erkundung des dunklen Unbekannten. Der Atlas der Sternenwege enthält 2843 Routen durch die Sektoren des Segmentum Obscurus, die von der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} bis zum to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} reichen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je fais partie de la maison Orsellio, une dynastie très ancienne de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Depuis des temps immémoriaux, notre famille se voue à acquérir des connaissances et à repousser les frontières de l'inconnu. L'Atlas des étoiles contient deux mille huit cent quarante-trois itinéraires qui couvrent les secteurs du Segmentum Obscurus, des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} à la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}... »
languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: « Je fais partie de la maison Orsellio, une dynastie très ancienne de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Depuis des temps immémoriaux, notre famille se voue à acquérir des connaissances et à repousser les frontières de l'inconnu. L'Atlas des étoiles contient deux mille huit cent quarante-trois itinéraires qui couvrent les secteurs du Segmentum Obscurus, des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} à la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kadim bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} hanedanlığı olan Orsellio Hanesi'ndenim. Ailem, ezelden beridir irfan edinme peşinde koşarak bilinmez karanlığın sınırlarını zorlamıştır. Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nda Segmentum Obscurus'un sektörlerinin haritasını çıkaran ve {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nden{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra'ya{/g} kadar uzanan iki bin sekiz yüz kırk üç rota bulunur..."
languages.original_text: "I am a part of House Orsellio, an ancient dynasty of the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Since time immemorial, our family has served to advance knowledge, pushing at the boundaries of the dark unknown. The Starway Atlas contains two thousand eight hundred and forty-three routes that chart the sectors of the Segmentum Obscurus and reach all the way from the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: "Kadim bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} hanedanlığı olan Orsellio Hanesi'ndenim. Ailem, ezelden beridir ilim irfan peşinde koşarak bilinmeyenlerin sınırlarını zorlamıştır. Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nda Segmentum Obscurus'un sektörlerinin haritasını çıkaran ve {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nden {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra{/g}'ya kadar uzanan iki bin sekiz yüz kırk üç rota bulunmaktadır..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
